channel.title: Comments on: eBay Updates Fees With Mixed Results

item.title: By: amodernguy
item.dc:creator: amodernguy
item.description: <a href="http://amodernguy.wordpress.com/2008/02/11/why-i-am-joining-the-ebay-strike-boycott/" rel="nofollow">Why I am Joining the Ebay Strike</a>
item.content:encoded: Why I am Joining the Ebay Strike

item.title: By: amodernguy
item.dc:creator: amodernguy
item.description:
As a small Powerseller I have grave concerns regarding the new fee schedule and the changes to the feedback system.
I have detailed my concerns in an <a href="http://amodernguy.wordpress.com/2008/02/01/an-open-letter-to-ebay/" rel="nofollow">An Open Letter to eBay</a> on my blog.
http://amodernguy.wordpress.com
item.content:encoded:
As a small Powerseller I have grave concerns regarding the new fee schedule and the changes to the feedback system.

I have detailed my concerns in an An Open Letter to eBay on my blog.

http://amodernguy.wordpress.com
